Title: SECTIONS
Paragraph Text: 2.Extension and amendment of Integrated Goods and Services Tax Act.

Title: SECTIONS
Paragraph Text: 3.Repeal and saving.THE INTEGRATED GOODS AND SERVICES TAX (EXTENSION TO JAMMU AND KASHMIR)ACT, 2017ACT NO. 27 OF2017[23rd August, 2017.]An Act to provide for the extension of the Integrated Goods and Services Tax Act, 2017 to the Stateof Jammu and Kashmir.BE it enacted by Parliament in the Sixty-eighth Year of the Republic of India as follows:—

Title: SECTIONS
Paragraph Text: 1. Short title and commencement. —(1) This Act may be called the Integrated Goods and Services Tax(Extension to Jammu and Kashmir) Act, 2017.

Title: SECTIONS
Paragraph Text: (2) It shall be deemed to have come into force on the 8th day of July, 2017.

Title: SECTIONS
Paragraph Text: 2. Extension and amendment of Integrated Goods and Services Tax Act. —The Integrated Goods and ServicesTax Act, 2017 (13 of 2017) thereinafter referred to as the principal Act) and all rules, notifications, schemes and ordersmade hereunder by the Central Government are hereby extended to, and shall be in force in, the State of Jammu andKashmir.

Title: SECTIONS
Paragraph Text: (2) With effect from the date of commencement of this Act, in the principal Act, in section 1, in sub-section ( 2), thewords “except the State of Jammu and Kashmir” shall be omitted.

Title: SECTIONS
Paragraph Text: 3. Repeal and saving. —(1) The Integrated Goods and Services Tax (Extension to Jammu and Kashmir) Ordinance(Ord. 4 of  2017)  is hereby repealed.

Title: SECTIONS
Paragraph Text: (2) Notwithstanding such repeal, anything done or any action taken under the said Ordinance shall be deemed tohave been done or taken under the corresponding provisions of this Act.
